answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!Since you have high blood pressure, you must be on blood pressure medications. A feeling of floating/slipping at times happens when the blood pressure suddenly falls. It can also happen when awakened from very deep sleep or when very sleepy. Hypoglycemia too is another cause. Another possibility is punctate hemorrhage in brain. This can be dangerous. Please consult a doctor as it is difficult to give a confirmed diagnosis on net.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: I have no thyroid due to cancer i had.. history of high blood pressure.. Am 33 I get these like 5 a year tell recent just last week I have had 3 to 4 it so weird. Last night when happend was 8 or 830pm finished dinner at like 530 or 6 so I took blood sugar 126... again at 10 was 99 so I doubt was that. no i dont have diabetes moms machine. I could not check blood pressure.Last night I was online when happened felt like i was slipping out of my chair was so weird seemed like floating in air. Hard to explain. I also felt little nauseated.. what can this be
title: Get Dizzy something shifts
